short_summary: Request for Proposal (RFP) for six (6) Forklifts
description: AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME: According to , a  on will be held to purchase six (6) forklifts, ancillary items and Integrated Logistic Support for DFO. The procurement will be held to select suppliers holding a Supply Arrangement (SA) under the Request (RFSA) E60HS-21FRKL/A, with . For details on how to become a pre-qualified supplier for this RFSA, refer to CanadaBuys Tender Opportunities (https://canadabuys.canada.ca/en/tender-opportunities/tender-notice/pw-hs-653-79868).
full_summary:
**Notice Type:** Request for Proposal (RFP) against Supply Arrangement
**Reference Number:** WS4621875358-Doc4624992056
**Amendment Number:** 4

**Publication Date:** June 13, 2024
**Tender Closing Date:** July 22, 2024, at 2:00 PM EDT

**Notice Details:**
The Department of Fisheries and Oceans (DFO) has a requirement to procure six (6) forklifts with ancillary items and Integrated Logistic Support items. The bid solicitation process is exclusive to suppliers holding a Supply Arrangement (SA) under the Request (RFSA) E60HS-21FRKL/A.

**Trade Agreements:**
The procurement is subject to the following trade agreements:
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)

**Regions of Opportunity:**
Federal initiatives to support business growth and development in various regions across Canada, are outlined in the attached file.

**Procurement Category:** Goods
**Procurement Method:** Competitive - Selective tendering
**Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price

**Contact Information:**
For additional information, please contact:
Natalia Vengerov (She/Her)
Department of Public Works and Government Services (SPAC)
Email: [natalia.vengerov@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:natalia.vengerov@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

**Required Documents:**
The bidder must submit:
* The bid submission
* Required supporting documentation
by July 17, 2024, at 2:00 PM EDT.

Please note that all offers submitted after 2:00 PM EDT will result in the bid being declared non-responsive.

**Access to Tender Documents:**
The tender documents are available on CanadaBuys.

**Language:**
English and French. Please use one of the language
